headline: 2025-10-29 — The European Broadcasting Union (EBU) published research showing leading AI assistants misrepresent news content in nearly half of their responses (≈50% of responses).
2025-10-27 — Microsoft will retain a stake valued at about $135 billion (roughly 27% ownership) in OpenAI Group PBC after control is transferred to the OpenAI Foundation, a nonprofit.
2025-10-28 — Reuters (Thomson Reuters' news division) reaches 'billions of people worldwide every day' — i.e., a multi-billion daily reach (billions DAU).
2025-10-30 — Bloomberg Intelligence published an analysis by Mandeep Singh and Robert Biggar highlighting AI’s shift toward inference workloads (1 Bloomberg Intelligence report published).
2025-10-27 — Waymo remains a leading autonomous-driving program (maintains top position in industry rankings — rank #1 position).
